detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract SFIToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SFIToken.sol#74-188) has payable functions:
	 - SFIToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SFIToken.sol#184-186)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0
